projects.heading: shadcn Figma Kit
projects.description:
A starter for anyone looking to build using the popular shadcn framework. It's a (very close!) 1:1 match between Figma and the shadcn documentation, including:

1. Variables for color, size, and typography

2. Styles for text and effects

3. Components

4. Icons

5. Example pattern blocks e.g. a login form

6. Page templates as components
projects.title: shadcn Figma Kit

projects.heading: Simple Design System at Figma
projects.description:
SDS was a first for Figma ‚Äì a UI and code-backed design system available within Figma, alongside Apple's iOS and Material's kits.

It's a base design system that shows how Figma‚Äôs Variables, Styles, Components, and Code Connect can be used alongside a React codebase to form a complete picture of a responsive web design system.

Key features include:

* 400+ components, backed by code (Code Connect available on paid plans only)

* Styles and variables support, including light and dark mode

* Examples ‚Äì Full screen mockups that can be inserted into your file to go from blank page to polished designs quickly

* Feather icons
projects.title: Simple Design System

workExperience.heading: Designer Advocate at Figma
workExperience.description:
Summary\
‚Ä¢ Employee #6 in London, establishing EMEA advocacy as first non-sales IC\
‚Ä¢ Helped hire and grow advocacy team in EMEA to 5\
‚Ä¢ Established myself as a globally recognised design systems expert through resource creation, consultancy, and public-facing conferences, livestreams, and events\
\
Projects\
‚Ä¢ Solo designer of Simple Design System, Figma‚Äôs first official in-product library\
‚Ä¢ Launched Variables, presenting at Config to \~4k+ people\
‚Ä¢ Built customer-facing demo assets with the brand team for enterprise sales customer onboarding and training\
\
Recognised expertise\
‚Ä¢ Crafted best practice advice files, articles, videos across Community, YouTube, and the Figma blog. \
‚Ä¢ Community files duplicated \~50k+ times\
‚Ä¢ Scripted and recorded ‚ÄúMy First Variable‚Äù YouTube series. \~90k views.\
‚Ä¢ Represented Figma in Belgium, Germany, Ireland, Poland, Spain, Sweden, and the US\
\
Consulting\
‚Ä¢ Customer-facing design systems expert for 300+ enterprise clients, including JP Morgan Chase, Airbus, Adobe, Spotify, and British Airways.\
\
Community\
‚Ä¢ Coached speakers for 6 Config conferences\
‚Ä¢ Grew design systems focused personal Twitter account from 1.4k to \~60k followers in 4.5 years
workExperience.title: Designer Advocate
